name: Let's Code Android App In Kotlin
description:
• What we'll do
GDG Vut in partnerniship with surrounding GDGs(Pretoria, Johanesburg..) is organizing an Android and Kotlin related event on 03th of February 2018 at Vaal University of Technology. “Let's Code Android App In Kotlin ” will be a day of getting started in Kotlin, learning, Show cases and demonstrating what's new in Android 8.0 Oreo .

• What to bring
pen , notebook , laptop and have android studio installed

• Important to know
price for best performers/ developers

name: Flutter I/O Extended 2018
description: GDG Vaal in partnership with GDG Pretoria and GDG Johanesburg are organizing Flutter I/O Extended 2018 on 30th of June 2018 at Sandton City Johannesburg. The event will consist of Flutter Codelabs : from creating a simple Flutter app to Building Beautiful UIs with Flutter and Integrating to Firebase.

name: Build native mobile apps with Flutter
description: GDG Vaal will be organizing Flutter Study Jam in Sandton Johannesburg from the 24th at 10:30 Am to 25th at 3:30 PM of November 2018. Build native mobile apps with flutter will show how to build quality Android and IOS apps.

name: DevFest Gauteng
description:
On the 22th of December 2018 from 10:30 Am to 3:30PM, GDG Vaal will be organizing Devfest Gauteng at 13 Wessel road in Sandton Johannesburg. The event will cover code labs and workshop with regards to Flutter and Firebase.
#DevFest18 #DevFestStories
